From the brand

Tenmiro Led Lights

Dedicated to providing personalized and fun life experiences

Tenmiro committed to bringing colorful visual effects and unique home experience to families. Here, you can get RGB lights whose colors can beswitched at will , strip lights that guide the visual magic and dynamic sparkling lights. Tenmiro not only bring your home even life infinite daydream space, but also shock vitality. Come to Tenmiro, come to colorful home and life.

More Size

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LIGHT STRIPS: You can adjust the light strips brightness from 1% to 100% to suit the various places. LED strip lights have memory function. By the smart App, you can experience the timing function, 28 Dynamic modes, you can also DIY your unique color
EASY TO INSTALL: Fully equipped accessories, it comes with 50ft Led light strip, power adapter, Ir remote control, controller and instruction manual, no need for any other devices, simply stick the strip lights on clean, dry surface. start to enjoy strip lighting
MULTIPLE SCENES AVAILABLE: 50ft Led strip lights long enough, suitable for home decor, it can be used for decorating your bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen, porch, cabinet, Christmas tree, bar. especially great for Holiday event decoration like Christmas, Halloween, party, birthday, new year, and more

TENMIRO Smart LED strip Lights

Humanized design.Intelligent APP offers you more joy.Vibrant, bright Led strip lights meet your need for colorful home decoration. Just a simple action, you can set these color changing lights according to your preference.

The LED strips are ideal for bedroom, kitchen, under cabinets, living rooms, TV backlighting, garden, balconies, patios, parties, holidays, or family events.

You can use virtually anywhere you want!

Led light color will change with the rhythm of the sound and music, dance with the strip lights！！

Color changing lights bring more fun to your party

Lights for bedroom can auto open/close at set time

LED light with easy adjustment of color and brightness

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180° flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180° flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180° to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop children’s intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you don’t need to buy a SIM card for this.

【Upgraded Toddler Cell Phone】Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
【180° Flip Camera】Upgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
【Powerful Battery Life】Continuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
【Safe & Durable Shockproof】This toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for children’s skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
【Great Gift for Kids】Perfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180° flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

Product Description

It’s on! Game That Song!

Pick The Topic, Play The Songs, Choose The Winner!

Game That Song is the perfect card game for families, game night, parties, gifts, and people who just want to have a good time together. It even works as a game while social distancing and playing over video conference!

Easy to learn

Connects players by bringing back memories through music

Perfect for game night

If you love sharing music, you’ll love this game!

If you love music, you’ll LOVE Game That Song!

Have you ever spent time sharing music with your friends? This timeless tradition connects us like no other activity can.

But with Game That Song, the competition is on!

Who can pick the best song for the topic on the card? Who is best at figuring out the judge?

Game That Song is fun and easy to play, but challenging to win!

Endless Possibilities! Easy To Learn!

Get started right away!

If you know how to play music on your phone, you’ll understand how to play Game That Song after the first round.

The Ultimate Gift!

Your friends and family will never get bored of this game!

There’s always a new angle, a new strategy, a new song, and a new way to try and win! It’s easy to play, but challenging to win!

Get Game That Song! What’s do you get when you order?

1 beautiful black box, about 2x the depth of a deck of cards100 poker sized cards with different topics and 1 instruction cardUnlimited fun!

Party Games for Any Occasion

Easy To Learn

Connect through Music

✘

✘

✘

✘

Connect through Animals

✘

✘

✘

✘

Great Icebreaker

Designed for Fun

Appropriate for families

About the Startup Eric Robertson

College Professor

Describe your products in 3 words.

Fun, Connections, Music

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

I’ve coached little league for a long time and my wife and I would play walk-up songs for each kid as they stepped up to bat. It was always so fun to try and find the right song for every kid! We eventually started trying to come up with “the perfect song” for different situations. We made it into a card game for our friends and they loved it! We HAD TO make it into a game for the world to play!

What makes your product special?

It builds connections through music and competition. You get to hear songs that really take you back and then sometimes awesome tunes that you’ve never heard before.

What has been the best part of your experience?

Testing the product!

We’ve stayed up super late playing with so many people. Every time you play you have a blast and also get to know the players on a whole new level.

Perfect for game night to build connections with adults, family, teens and all music lovers!
Easy to learn, but challenging to win! Choose the card, play the songs, pick the winner!
Fun conversation starter to see how well you know the music taste of your family and friends
Take it with you or play over videoconference. As long as you have a way to listen to music and the deck, you can play!

It's on! Game That Song!

Pick The Topic, Play The Songs, Choose The Winner!

Game That Song is the perfect card game for families, game night, parties, gifts, and people who just want to have a good time together. It even works as a game while social distancing and playing over video conference!

Game That Song is fun and easy to play, but challenging to win!

Endless Possibilities!

Easy To Learn!

Get started right away!

If you know how to play music on your phone, you'll understand how to play Game That Song after the first round.

The Ultimate Gift!

Your friends and family will never get bored of this game!

There's always a new angle, a new strategy, a new song, and a new way to try and win! It's easy to play, but challenging to win!

Get Game That Song!

What's do you get when you order?

  • 1 beautiful black box, about 2x the depth of a deck of cards
  • 100 poker sized cards with different topics and 1 instruction card
  • Unlimited fun!

Party Games for Any Occasion

Game That Song

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

I've coached little league for a long time and my wife and I would play walk-up songs for each kid as they stepped up to bat. It was always so fun to try and find the right song for every kid! We eventually started trying to come up with "the perfect song" for different situations. We made it into a card game for our friends and they loved it! We HAD TO make it into a game for the world to play!

What makes your product special?

Warranty & Support

Price: $19.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:22:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Make life better by controlling everything in the palm of your hand. From intuitive lights to automated home devices, our smart products lineup elevates moods, moments, and beyond.

Top-tier quality made accessible for any home.

Smart Devices

For the Planet

Part of our mission is to make homes safer, cozier, and happier to live in. And that includes our biggest home – the planet.

That’s why we’ve made sure every Vont product comes with a link to an online instruction manual, so your devices are always ready to make life easier, right out of the box.

DRIVE IN A GALAXY OF COLOR LIGHTS | CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR – Choose from 16 million colors and 30 unique scene modes. DIY effects, adjust brightness, and personalize this RGB LED strip to transform your daily drives into vibrant road trips.
QUICK SETUP | EASY CONTROL W/ VONT HOME APP – Just plug it in, power on, and lay out the 21-feet, single-design strip light suitable for various car models. Secure with the cable ties/stickers included and wirelessly control with the app or via a convenient controller.
﻿LIGHTS JAM W/ YOUR FAVORITE BEATS | ENJOY MUSIC MODE – Vont Car Lights built-in mic syncs with your car’s music in real-time, letting you experience a colorful car karaoke with your favorite beats.
﻿SAFE TO USE & WATER-RESISTANT – The interior strip light’s robust built comes with safety features to make you feel extra secure. It’s flame retardant, water-resistant, has a high-temp resistance, and is harmless to kids.
﻿24/7 CUSTOMER CARE & LIFETIME WARRANTY – Covered for life, it’s warranted against loss, theft, and defects in materials and workmanship as long as you own your car lights. Vont Customer Satisfaction Wizards are with you 24/7 – for life.

Read more

Read more

Next Level Interior Safety

Vont Smart Car Strip Light’s sophisticated engineering makes sure you always feel secure with its safety features. Rated with IP20 (only for indoor use), it’s water-resistant, flame retardant, and super-safe to touch.

Activate Rhythmic Roadtrips

Color lights are one thing, but having lights that dance to the beat of your music is beyond everyday driving. Activate Music Mode and witness your strip lights sync with your car’s music and unbreakable car karaoke.

Four Mighty Light Strips

The single-design build features four strip lights with twelve powerful LEDs per light. Every LED is meticulously designed to bring you high-grade light that when combined, produces its 16 million-color dazzling brilliance – rousing your car to life.

Read more

From the brand

Smart Lighting Expert

How did we get our start?

Break out of the box and make ordinary things more interesting.

Why do we love what we do?

Interest will be the source of all motivation, and work can make your ideas come true one by one.

What problem are we solving?

We have been making progress by maintaining an outstanding “Quality Products” ratio for our products.

DIY Modes: Car led lights has 16 million colors, or custom the colors and adjust the brightness through the smart app’s color palette, Let you easily create your own car atmosphere.Perfect for decorating cars for Halloween and Christmas.
Scenario Modes: Led lights for car has 28 dynamic modes for you to choose, or customize the parameters of led strip lights (automatic, flash, jump,fade in and out,brightness adjustment,speed adjustment) Please feel free to use your imagination.
Dynamic Music Sync: The lights of led car light will change in sync with the rhythm of the song or music. Let the lights dance with your music and enhance your driving pleasure.
3 Types Control: 44-key RF remote control with its own battery, 4-button control box with built-in sensitive microphone, and Bluetooth Smart APP.
2-Line Design: 1 main line separated into 2 branch lines, as long as the line is hidden under the car mat, without having to worry about exposed wiring or an untidy appearance.the best choice for truck accessories and jeep accessories.
3 Installation Methods: Strong Glue, Screws, Hook and Loop Tape, built-in overvoltage fuse, led interior car lights can adheres very well to different surfaces and very safe,extremely low-heat, touchable.
Gifts for Men and Women: These RGB music car led floor lights always bring joy to him or her, are easy to use, and are a great choice for a birthday gift.

Read more

For Friend:

It is now, let’s create a car light party together.

For Family:

Bring your children together to enjoy the fun of intelligent technology

For Lovers:

Let the colorful lights accompany you and your lover on a romantic trip.

Read more

Read more

Read more

Package Contains

Car Cigarette lighter / LED Strip Light / Fuse / RF Remote Control / Hook and Loop Tape / Screws / Cable Ties / User Manuals

3 Installation Method

Strong Glue / Screws / Hook and Loop Tape.

Compatibility

It works on any vehicle that has a 12v power adapter. Also known as the cigarette lighter.

Working Temperature

-10℃~45℃/(14℉~113℉)

Specification:

  • Chips: 5050 SMD
  • Input: AC 100-240V / 50-60Hz
  • Output: DC 12V=2A
  • Power: Car Cigarette lighter
  • Light strip length: 230mm / (9in)
  • Power cord length: 460mm / 1160mm / 1720mm (18in*45in*64in)

Can it be set to automatically come on when you enter the car？

  • Yes if you leave it plugged in with the power button on, it will power on and off with your car’s ignition and it will keep the color you set last time.

How to connect the Smart APP?

  1. Scan the QR code on the box to download the smart APP
  2. Open your phone Bluetooth to search for led lights devices, device name format: KSxx-xxxxxx
  3. Forbid to click the led lights device name directly, they will be connected automatically when you enter the APP.
  4. Enter the smart APP, click car light to start your technology journey.

They’re broken,can I get replacements?

  • Yes,Don’t worry, Don’t be shy, please tell us that if there is any quality problem with the product, We will help you until you are satisfied.

User Guide:

  • Use “cloth” or “paper towel” to clean the surface of the object where the car led lights will be installed.
  • Separate the tape from the backing layer.Paste the led strip lights on the surface of the object and press hard to make it fit more evenly and tightly.
  • The adhesive strength of the glue is related to time, the adhesive strength after the first paste is 40% of its maximum adhesion, and it takes 72 hours to reach the maximum adhesive strength.
  • If you have any question about our product, please go to your Amazon product page “Sold” – “Question”.
